summary: Diff adds a multi-page React app scaffold with TanStack Router, a sticky navbar + footer, marketing sections (offer banner, membership, testimonials, FAQ), gallery grid and before/after slider, and a booking form wired to a Motoko backend method. Key gap: backend appointment storage is not in stable state, and backend includes unrequested “car wash” service catalog + extra query APIs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store appointment records in stable state for the canister lifetime and return a confirmation value (appointment id).
missing_requirements.reason: Backend stores appointments in an in-memory Map and nextId var without any stable variables or upgrade hooks shown; this will not persist across upgrades and may not meet the stable-state requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend includes an unrelated default services list (Standard Wash, Premium Wash, Interior Cleaning) that does not match salon services.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for a backend services catalog, and the included services are for vehicle washing rather than salon offerings.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend exposes extra query endpoints getServices, getAppointment, and getAllAppointments.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-9 only requires a create-appointment method callable from the frontend; additional listing/query APIs were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend includes next-themes ThemeProvider and a UI toast system (sonner) wired in App.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request theme switching or toast infrastructure explicitly (though it may be used to show success states).
